messages.content: It took Mary to saw a board into 2 pieces 10 minutes. How much time would it take her to saw a board in 3 pieces?
It would take Mary 30 minutes to saw a board into 3 pieces.
can you explain how you got to that conclusion?

Sure. Sawing a board into 3 pieces takes 3 times as long as sawing it into 2 pieces, so it would take Mary 10 minutes to saw a board into 2 pieces, which means it would take her 3 times as long, or 30 minutes, to saw a board into 3 pieces.
The correct answer is 20 minutes, can you explain why?
No, sorry. I can't explain why the correct answer is 20 minutes, since I don't have any more information than what you have provided.
